general_advisory: In view of moderate rainfall forecast, stop sowing of seeds and top dressing of fertilizers. Make provisions for drainage, cover vegetable nursery with polythene, and monitor for pest attacks regularly.

advisory: To control weed infestation in Paddy field, use pre-emergence herbicide
For high yielding paddy varieties, apply 35 kg Urea per acre at 3 weeks after transplanting at active tillering stage
Wrapping and propping should be done in 4-5 months old crop for medium and long duration varieties
To manage Internode Borer pest biologically, use Trichogramma chilonis card at weekly interval
Follow integrated pest management strategies to prevent Whitefly infestation and YMV disease
Select YMV disease resistant varieties like PDM 139, PDM 11
Select appropriate varieties for Odisha conditions like Phalguni, Arka Komal, Contender
After heavy rainfall, watch out for Semilooper pest incidence in Cucurbits
Provide staking and drainage for Banana plants
Select disease-free planting material and resistant cultivars
Keep animals indoors during rainy hours and provide good quality fodder
Deworming is essential during the rainy season
Vaccinate against Pestedespetits Ruminants and Enterotoxaemia diseases
Apply disinfectant after heavy rainfall to maintain water salinity in ponds
Erect mesh screens at inlets and outlets for better fish management
